name: Space Prison (Stumbling Clowns Corp, Jhonny6, Mike moli, inthenightdarkness)
name_original: Space Prison (Stumbling Clowns Corp, Jhonny6, Mike moli, inthenightdarkness)
description:
Gameplay

Space prision is a tower defense video game with a 2D platformer and Lateral Scroll. You are a alien prisioner who invented a machine and cables to scape from the captivity. However other prisioner and guard will try to stop you. Could you stop all of them?

Combat System

You will have three power to attack and other for cure your machine and cables. Guards, robotic dogs and bots can be atack with any power, fire man can be attack with ice, poison man can be attack with fire one and finally ice man can be attack with poison. Also you can put a turret that will help you.

Check out our profile to find more about us:

Game design:

Julia Martinez

Juan Carlos Maroto
